input_data = np.random.random_sample([4, 8, 40, 40, 32])
layer = ConvLSTM2D(32, 4, 4, input_shape=(8, 40, 40, 32), border_mode=
    'same', go_backwards=True)
self.modelTestSingleLayer(input_data, layer, dump_weights=True)
layer2 = ConvLSTM2D(32, 4, 4, input_shape=(8, 40, 40, 32), return_sequences
    =True, activation='relu', inner_activation='sigmoid', border_mode='same')
self.modelTestSingleLayer(input_data, layer2, dump_weights=True, rtol=1e-05,
    atol=1e-05)
